text.title: Be Yourself and Impress Others
text.head: Be Yourself and Impress Others
text.p: You may not know , but you should always be yourself , even when you 're trying to impress everyone . This can be hanging out with many people or dressing to show who you are . Need some help ? Read below on how to do so .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Create yourself ! You may not know who you are , what you like , what you want to do in life , but this is okay . Create yourself , do n't find yourself , create yourself . Create your own personality , but be yourself . Creating your personality does n't mean copying others , but you can always get influence . Have confidence , a good sense of style and a contagious smile .
Dress to impress . Bring out who you are in your own fashion sense . Do n't throw on an outfit everyday -- spend time on how you want to bring out yourself in each outfit .

Remain who you are . You may change , and always will , but you will always be yourself . Know that if you are being yourself , and someone does n't like you , they 're not right . Ignore them and know that there are many other people you can impress , you do n't need to impress anyone . Be yourself , everyone 's going to get judged anyway , sometime in their life .

Find the real friends . Do n't use someone as a friend just to act popular . This is very common . Find the real friends , the ones that you think will really be there for you , and not your popularity .

Try making as many friends as possible . Smile at everyone , compliment them , and start talking to them more . Once this happens , you may have a sleepover or hang out sometime , this can lead to a whole new friendship .

Do what you like , and only you . Do n't do drugs to be cool and do n't be someone you 're not to fit in . Nobody can make you do anything , and you are your own person . Nobody can own you , and never let them .
Never be shy . This will make some people think you 're sad , and others may think you have a low self esteem . Smile at people , keep your chin up and be friendly .
Be confident . Have great posture and do what you want . Do n't be shy and never bully someone .
Find your talents and make it shine . Acting ? Dancing ? Whatever it is , perform , take classes or join clubs . Find something to make new friends and impress people that way .

You are finished ! Remember that if you do have more friends , or impressed more people , know to stay who you are . Never judge people and know that even if you are trying to impress everyone , not everyone may be impressed , they 're not worth it . You are . So , have confidence , keep your head up and smile .

text.head: Tips

list.item: Know that not everyone will love you , and that 's okay .
Do n't act like you 're the best , but have confidence .
Do n't try too hard to become a different person .
